scripts.dev: export SANDBOX_ENV=DEV && concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-proxy" "nodemon dist" "tsc --watch"
scripts.tst: export SANDBOX_ENV=TST && concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-proxy" "nodemon dist" "tsc --watch"
scripts.qa: export SANDBOX_ENV=QA && concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-proxy" "nodemon dist" "tsc --watch"
scripts.prod: export SANDBOX_ENV=PROD && concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-proxy" "nodemon dist"
